#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
typedef long long int LL;
int n,k;
LL dp[100000][16];
LL solve(int mask,int last_used)
{
    if(dp[mask][last_used]!=-1)
        return dp[mask][last_used];
    bool temp=1;
    LL ans=0;
    for(int i=1;i<=n;i++){
        if((mask&(1<<i))==0){
            if(abs(i-last_used)<=k || last_used==0){
                ans+=solve(mask|(1<<i),i);
            }
            temp=0;
        }
    }
    if(temp==1)
        ans=1;
    dp[mask][last_used]=ans;
    return ans;
}
int main()
{
    int t;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        scanf("%d %d",&n,&k);
        memset(dp,-1,sizeof(dp));
        printf("%lld\n",solve(0,0));
    }
}
